about_the_game:
Galaxy Race is a VR sports game in which the player takes control of one of a handful original and colorful characters. Equipped with GraviDecks - a futuristic high tech hooverboards, the Graviators race against each other on various tracks somewhere in a galaxy.
Beside beautiful sights, tracks also consist lots of pickups giving the player access to throwing discs, mines, shields, power boosts, accelerators etc. Collecting these bring the player one step closer to the victory.

This game encourages players to use their motion in a fluid way. A right mixture of body balance and cunning will be essential. Our original and very attractive “GraviMotion” steering system is a completely new and smooth way to control your avatar in virtual reality.

Meet the Galaxy Race Heroes!




Last mission didn’t end according to plan. Now thinking about never doing a quest with Gourrian again she heard a radio transmission. "Are you into breakthrough technology? Mount a GraviDeck, race against other Graviators!" Tired with searching for hidden treasures and solving environmental puzzles, Margia applied for the Galaxy Race Tournment.


A broke and careless adventurer whose last mission did not end quite according to plan.
Now searching for a new quest he noticed a peculiar note "A new adventure awaits! Be the first to become a Master Graviator! Get the GraviDeck and race across galaxy!" Tired with killing rats and smashing barrels, Gourrian applied for the Galaxy Race Tournament.


Hiding in the Thieves Den and looking for a way to go off the radar for a while she got a message from an old friend. "Look what I've found, an official GraviDevk race! You used to be good with skateboards, these kids won't even know what hit them!" Tired with picking locks and sneaking through vents, Piro applied for the Galaxy Race Tournament.


Taking a long deserved break at a local Inn, Sawinar overheard a couple gossips. "Yeah! They, like, give you this hoovering board man and, like, teleport you to different places around the galaxy where you.. it's like a race... with WEAPONS!". Tired with grinding and the taste of mana potions, Sawinar applied for the Galaxy Race Tournament.

Game Features:


  • Introducing GraviMotion! Enjoy our original take on motion control in virtual reality.
    Master this technique and become a legend!
  • Learn to be feared! Know your weapons and how to use them against rival Graviators! Experiment with the arsenal at your disposal and find your favourite way of
    kicking some ass!
  • Beautiful Tracks! We go for quality over quantity! Maybe you are in a leading position, maybe you are the last or anywhere in between. Regardless of your position our detail rich tracks may prove a great vista to wonder for a second or two!
  • Fast paced action! Beside being nice to look at our tracks are truly a deadly battleground for a Graviator to prove their speed and cunning.
  • Race against a fresh and original character cast! Meet our bunch of reckless opportunists who travel the multiverse in search of new adventure!
  • Galaxy Race is filled with small detail for you to enjoy. It is more then just a racing game, we want it to be an experience showcasing the possibilities of virtual reality. So after a few successful runs, we encourage you to just have some fun with the game and try different stuff out!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel i5-6400
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 970 / RX 480
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR or Oculus PC. Standing or Room Scale
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel i7-7700
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1070
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: Do you think that you have seen everything when it comes to virtual reality games? Check out the revolutionary technology of Galaxy Race and enter the world of galalactic fun!
